content: गृहीत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [ग्रह् कर्मणि-क्त] {@--1@} Taken, seized, caught, held, grasped, laid hold of; केशेषु गृहीतः. {@--2@} Obtained, acquired, gained. {@--3@} Received, accepted. {@--4@} Robbed. {@--5@} Collected. {@--6@} Agreed, promised. {@--7@} Perceived, known, understood, learnt. {@--8@} Worn (see ग्रह्).
